name: Minty Fruit Salad
description: Summer is the season of stone fruit — juicy cherries, sweet peaches, perfect plums. Add a little mint and honey and you’ve got an amazing summer salad that is a turn away from the usual melon-heavy versions popular on picnic tables and at barbecues.
recipeCategory: breakfast, easy, quick, salads and dressings
recipeIngredient: 4 1/2 to 5 pounds chopped fresh stone fruit

recipeInstructions.text: Add chopped fresh stone fruit  (any of the following: peaches, cherries, plums, nectarines, apricots or mangoes), orange juice, mint leaves and honey. Stir and serve.
